sqlMap.sql: select u.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, u.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, u.BUSS_SCOPE, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_ID, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.CHECK_ORG_ID, u.CHECK_ORG_NAME, to_char(u.CHECK_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CHECK_DATE, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.CHECK_TOTAL_SCORE, u.CHECK_PROGRAM_NO CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_NO, TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO from TERM_REFINE_CHECK u left join BASE_TERMINAL t on t.term_id = u.term_id left join BASE_AREA a on a.AREA_ID=u.AREA_ID
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM TERM_REFINE_CHECK u left join BASE_TERMINAL t on t.term_id = u.term_id left join BASE_AREA a on a.AREA_ID=u.AREA_ID
sqlMap.insert: insert into TERM_REFINE_CHECK( TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, TERM_ID, AREA_NO, AREA_ID, CHECK_ORG_ID, AREA_MANAGE_ID, TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO, TERM_NO, TERM_NAME, BUSS_SCOPE, AREA_NAME, AREA_MANAGE_NAME, CHECK_ORG_NAME, CHECK_DATE, REMARK, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, STATE, DEL_FLAG, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME, TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO, CHECK_TOTAL_SCORE, MYSTIC_CMNR, MAIN_DEDUCT_SCORE_REMARK, CHECK_PROGRAM_NO )values( #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#, #TERM_ID#, #AREA_NO#, #AREA_ID#, #CHECK_ORG_ID#, #AREA_MANAGE_ID#, #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO#, #TERM_NO#, #TERM_NAME#, #BUSS_SCOPE#, #AREA_NAME#, #AREA_MANAGE_NAME#, #CHECK_ORG_NAME#, to_date(#CHECK_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #REMARK#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG#, #CHANN_ID#, #CHANN_NO#, #CHANN_NAME#, #TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO#, #CHECK_TOTAL_SCORE#, #MYSTIC_CMNR#, #MAIN_DEDUCT_SCORE_REMARK#, #CHECK_PROGRAM_NO# )
sqlMap.update:
update TERM_REFINE_CHECK
TERM_ID = #TERM_ID# TERM_NO = #TERM_NO# TERM_NAME = #TERM_NAME# AREA_NO = #AREA_NO# AREA_ID = #AREA_ID# AREA_NAME = #AREA_NAME#
CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID# CHANN_NO = #CHANN_NO# CHANN_NAME = #CHANN_NAME#
CHECK_ORG_ID = #CHECK_ORG_ID# AREA_MANAGE_ID = #AREA_MANAGE_ID# TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO# BUSS_SCOPE = #BUSS_SCOPE# AREA_MANAGE_NAME = #AREA_MANAGE_NAME# CHECK_ORG_NAME = #CHECK_ORG_NAME# CHECK_DATE =to_date(#CHECK_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REMARK = #REMARK# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE# TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO = #TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO# CHECK_TOTAL_SCORE = #CHECK_TOTAL_SCORE# CHECK_PROGRAM_NO = #CHECK_PROGRAM_NO#
MYSTIC_CMNR = #MYSTIC_CMNR# MAIN_DEDUCT_SCORE_REMARK = #MAIN_DEDUCT_SCORE_REMARK#
where TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update TERM_REFINE_CHECK set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, u.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, u.BUSS_SCOPE, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.AREA_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_ID, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.CHECK_ORG_ID, u.CHECK_ORG_NAME, to_char(u.CHECK_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') CHECK_DATE, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.CHECK_TOTAL_SCORE, TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO from TERM_REFINE_CHECK u where u.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#

select u.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, u.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, u.BUSS_SCOPE, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.AREA_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_ID, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.CHECK_ORG_ID, u.CHECK_ORG_NAME, to_char(u.CHECK_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CHECK_DATE, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.CHECK_TOTAL_SCORE, t.TERM_VERSION, c.tel CHANN_TEL, u.MYSTIC_CMNR, u.MAIN_DEDUCT_SCORE_REMARK, u.CHECK_PROGRAM_NO CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_NO, a.att_path ATT_PATH, TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO from TERM_REFINE_CHECK u left join BASE_TERMINAL t on t.term_id = u.term_id left join BASE_CHANN c on c.chann_id = t.chann_id_p left join BASE_ATT a on a.from_bill_id = u.term_refine_check_id where u.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID, u.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, u.PRJ_TYPE, u.PRJ_CODE, u.PRJ_NAME, u.PRJ_SCORE, u.CHECK_SCORE, u.CHECK_REMARK, u.CHECK_FINISH_SCORE, u.DEL_FLAG from TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL u
sqlMap.insert: insert into TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL( TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID, TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, PRJ_TYPE, PRJ_CODE, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_SCORE, CHECK_REMARK, CHECK_SCORE, DEL_FLAG )values( #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID#, #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#, #PRJ_TYPE#, #PRJ_CODE#, #PRJ_NAME#, #PRJ_SCORE#, #CHECK_REMARK#, #CHECK_SCORE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL
TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID# TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID# PRJ_TYPE = #PRJ_TYPE# PRJ_CODE = #PRJ_CODE# PRJ_NAME = #PRJ_NAME# PRJ_SCORE = #PRJ_SCORE# CHECK_REMARK = #CHECK_REMARK# CHECK_SCORE = #CHECK_SCORE# CHECK_FINISH_SCORE = #CHECK_FINISH_SCORE#
where TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID in ($TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_IDS$)
update TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL set CHECK_FINISH_SCORE = CHECK_SCORE where TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into TEMP_TERM_REFINE_CHECK( TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO, TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO, TERM_ID, TERM_NO, TERM_NAME, BUSS_SCOPE, AREA_ID, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME, AREA_MANAGE_ID, AREA_MANAGE_NAME, CHECK_ORG_ID, CHECK_ORG_NAME, CHECK_DATE, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME ) select #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#, #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO#, #TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO#, a.TERM_ID, a.TERM_NO, a.TERM_NAME, a.BUSS_SCOPE, a.AREA_ID, a.AREA_NO, a.AREA_NAME, temp.RYXXID, temp.XM, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, sysdate, #STATE#, #REMARK#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, a.CHANN_ID_P, a.CHANN_NO_P, a.CHANN_NAME_P from BASE_TERMINAL a left join BASE_AREA_CHRG_FLAT b on a.AREA_ID=b.AREA_ID and b.CHRG_TYPE='区域经理' left join (select d.RYXXID, d.XM, c.XTYHID from T_SYS_XTYH c left join T_SYS_RYXX d on c.RYXXID = d.RYXXID ) temp on b.CHRG_PSON_ID = temp.XTYHID where a.TERM_NO=#TERM_NO# and rownum=1
sqlMap.select: select count(1) from BASE_TERMINAL a where a.TERM_NO=#TERM_NO#
sqlMap.insert: insert into TEMP_TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL( TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID, TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, PRJ_TYPE, PRJ_CODE, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_SCORE, CHECK_REMARK, CHECK_SCORE, DEL_FLAG )values( #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID#, #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#, #PRJ_TYPE#, #PRJ_CODE#, #PRJ_NAME#, #PRJ_SCORE#, #CHECK_REMARK#, #CHECK_SCORE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.select: select TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO,TERM_NO from TERM_REFINE_CHECK where TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO = #TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO# and TERM_NO=#TERM_NO#

select dt.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID, dt.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID from TEMP_TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL dt where dt.PRJ_CODE =#PRJ_CODE# and dt.PRJ_NAME=#PRJ_NAME# and dt.del_flag=0 and dt.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID=#TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#
select count(1) from TEMP_TERM_REFINE_CHECK A GROUP BY A.TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO,A.TERM_NO HAVING COUNT(1)>1

select s.PRJ_TYPE,s.PRJ_CODE,s.PRJ_NAME,s.PRJ_SCORE from ERP_CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_DTL s left join ERP_CHANN_CHECK_PLAN t on t.chann_check_plan_id = s.chann_check_plan_id left join PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL d on d.DATA_DTL_CODE = t.PLAN_TYPE where s.DEL_FLAG=0 and d.DATA_DTL_NAME = #BUSS_SCOPE# and s.CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_ID=#CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_ID#
select * from TEMP_TERM_REFINE_CHECK where TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID in (select TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID from TEMP_TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL GROUP BY TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, PRJ_CODE HAVING COUNT(1) > 1)
select count(1) from TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL where PRJ_CODE = #PRJ_CODE# and TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID# and DEL_FLAG = 0
select t.term_refine_check_dtl_id from TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL t where t.del_flag = 0 and t.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#
sqlMap.insert: insert into TERM_REFINE_CHECK( TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO, TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO, TERM_ID, TERM_NO, TERM_NAME, BUSS_SCOPE, AREA_ID, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME, AREA_MANAGE_ID, AREA_MANAGE_NAME, CHECK_ORG_ID, CHECK_ORG_NAME, CHECK_DATE, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME ) select TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, TERM_REFINE_CHECK_NO, TERM_REFINE_TASK_NO, TERM_ID, TERM_NO, TERM_NAME, BUSS_SCOPE, AREA_ID, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME, AREA_MANAGE_ID, AREA_MANAGE_NAME, CHECK_ORG_ID, CHECK_ORG_NAME, CHECK_DATE, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME from TEMP_TERM_REFINE_CHECK

insert into TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL( TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID, TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, PRJ_TYPE, PRJ_CODE, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_SCORE, CHECK_REMARK, CHECK_SCORE, DEL_FLAG ) select TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID, TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID, PRJ_TYPE, PRJ_CODE, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_SCORE, CHECK_REMARK, CHECK_SCORE, DEL_FLAG from TEMP_TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL
sqlMap.update: update TERM_REFINE_CHECK a set CHECK_TOTAL_SCORE = (select sum(b.CHECK_SCORE) from TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL b where a.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = b.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID) where a.CHECK_TOTAL_SCORE is null

update TERM_REFINE_CHECK a set CHECK_TOTAL_SCORE = (select decode(sum(b.CHECK_SCORE),null,0,sum(b.CHECK_SCORE)) from TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL b where a.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = b.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID and DEL_FLAG=0) where a.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#
sqlMap.select: select t.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL_ID from TERM_REFINE_CHECK_DTL t where t.DEL_FLAG=0 and t.TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID = #TERM_REFINE_CHECK_ID#
select t.CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_ID from ERP_CHANN_CHECK_PLAN t where t.CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_NO = #CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_NO#
